sharkord.author: Diogo Martino
sharkord.description: A plugin that allows users to stream IPTV channels directly within Sharkord

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/sharkord-iptv --target bun --minify --format esm && cp package.json dist/sharkord-iptv/ && mkdir -p dist/sharkord-iptv/bin
scripts.build:dev: bun run build && cp -r dist/* /home/martino/repos/sharkord/apps/server/data/plugins/ && cp ./bin/ffmpeg /home/martino/repos/sharkord/apps/server/data/plugins/sharkord-iptv/bin && chmod +x /home/martino/repos/sharkord/apps/server/data/plugins/sharkord-iptv/bin/ffmpeg
